content: {"name": "Meals On Wheels NJ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Their local Area Agency on Aging would be able to help as well: https://www.state.nj.us/humanservices/doas/home/saaaa.html\n\nSeniors who are homebound and unable to get their own nourishment may be eligible for their local Meals on Wheels program.One or sometimes more hot meals are provided in a day at least five days per week to older persons (60+) who are homebound due to illness, incapacitating disability, or isolation. Call the Aging and Disability Resource Connection at 1.877.222.3737 Or find your local County Agency on Aging here: https://www.state.nj.us/humanservices/doas/home/saaaa.html", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mealsonwheelsamerica.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(877) 222-3737", "type": "voice"}]}
